abstract: Nepal is latest country to ban surrogacy amid concerns over exploitation of surrogates, oversight and safety; move leaves few low-cost surrogacy options for would-be parents in developed countries who have turned to places like Nepal.

headline.print_headline: Fewer Surrogacy Options as Nepal Joins a Trend
headline.main: Nepal Bans Surrogacy, Leaving Couples With Few Low-Cost Options

snippet: The country shut down a robust industry amid concerns over exploitation, oversight and safety.
lead_paragraph: The country shut down a robust industry amid concerns over exploitation, oversight and safety.
